Paragraph: 18 families with 21 informative matings for both properdin Factor B allotype and HLA - B were found .

| None in this paragraph |

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases. It only mentions the presence of informative matings for properdin Factor B allotype and HLA - B. Properdin Factor B allotype is a genetic variation, not a disease. HLA-B is a human leukocyte antigen, which is a part of the immune system and not a disease either.
